de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l0
Class L0Language

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.AbstractLanguage
      de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l0.L0Language
All Implemented Interfaces:
Language
Direct Known Subclasses:
L1Language
public class L0Language
extends AbstractLanguage

This class represents the language L0, which serves as a factory class for L0 related functionality.

Version:
$Rev: 415 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
Language, LanguageParser, LanguageScanner, LanguageTranslator

newBigStepProofModel

public BigStepProofModel newBigStepProofModel(Expression expression)
Allocates a new BigStepProofModel for the expression in this language, which is used to prove that expression using the big step semantic based on the rules from this language.

Parameters:
expression - the Expression for the big step proof model.
Returns:
the newly allocated big step proof model.
See Also:
Language.newBigStepProofModel(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Expression)
